name: G.G Series DRIFT CIRCUIT
description: Use your drifting technique to gracefully slide past the competition. Steering around corners lowers your speed, so it's all about choosing the best course line and being able to use your drifting skills with precision. At the start of each 3 lap race, conditions for winning will be displayed. After that, it's up to you and your speed demon prowess to drift through the Grand Prix and steal 1st place. Choose between EASY, NORMAL and HARD difficulty levels--perfect for the beginner and advanced racer alike!
